properties.description: OUTSIDE are a Creative People and Places project serving the communities of the Staffordshire Moorlands. Come along to our friendly and welcoming market stall for a chat and a brew. You can find out more about us, enjoy a jigsaw or craft or simply enjoy a hot drink while watching the shoppers pass by. Our stall, located in the newly refurbished Leek Butter Market, is open 8.30am-4pm on Wednesday, Friday and Saturday.
properties.title: OUTSIDE - Leek Market Stall

properties.description: We offer a warm welcome into our Church hall where we have refreshments, board games, craft activities, childrenâ€™s toys/play area and space to sit and chat. All free of charge. Our team of volunteers love being there too and look forward to welcoming new guests.
properties.title: Warm Space at Blythe Bridge Methodist Church
